description:
Located in Bensenville, Illinois, Kaiser Hafezi Law has become one of our area's leading law firms for personal injury and wrongful death. Backed by more than 100 years of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout DuPage County and the surrounding areas of the Chicago metro region who suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Offering the same level of sophisticated legal counsel found at larger practice, our firm's small size means that we can devote more of our attention on you and your needs, and we promise to do all we can to improve the likelihood you will obtain the maximum amount of compensation you deserve. To date, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, including many multimillion-dollar awards.

Personable and compassionate, we understand the stress and anxiety you are likely feeling regarding your unfortunate situation. We fight the hard fights, and our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers along with Superb client ratings and the Top Contributor Award from Avvo.

Whether your suffering is the result of a motor vehicle accident, a construction accident, an act of medical malpractice or any other preventable tragedy, you can contact Kaiser Hafezi Law to receive a free evaluation of your claim. Our law firm offers fluent Spanish-speaking services as well as virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
